title: List of companies of Uzbekistan
text:
<a href="Uzbekistan">Uzbekistan</a> is a <a href="doubly%20landlocked">doubly landlocked</a> country in <a href="Central%20Asia">Central Asia</a>. Uzbekistan's economy relies mainly on commodity production, including <a href="cotton">cotton</a>, <a href="gold">gold</a>, <a href="uranium">uranium</a>, and <a href="natural%20gas">natural gas</a>. Despite the declared objective of <a href="transition%20economy">transition</a> to a <a href="market%20economy">market economy</a>, its government continues to maintain economic controls which imports in favour of domestic "import substitution".
For further information on the types of business entities in this country and their abbreviations, see "<a href="Types%20of%20business%20entity%23Uzbekistan">Business entities in Uzbekistan</a>".
Notable firms.
This list includes notable <a href="company">companies</a> with primary <a href="headquarters">headquarters</a> located in the country. The industry and sector follow the <a href="Industry%20Classification%20Benchmark">Industry Classification Benchmark</a> taxonomy. Organizations which have ceased operations are included and noted as defunct.
